items.name: Dozen Raw Oysters
items.description: Freshly shucked oysters served with cocktail sauce, tabasco, and lime wedges.

items.name: Half-Dozen Raw Oysters
items.description: Freshly shucked oysters served with cocktail sauce, tabasco, and lime wedges.

items.name: Fried Oysters
items.description: Cajun seasoning, served with cocktail sauce.

items.name: Kickin' Wings
items.description: (6 pieces) Crispy fried chicken wings coated with garlic butter and our dry Cajun rub.

items.name: Fish n' Fries
items.description: (5 pieces) Crispy battered white fish served with tartar sauce and Cajun fries.

items.name: Shrimp Crisps n' Fries
items.description: (6 pieces) Whole shrimp wrapped in wonton, fried, and served with Cajun fries.

items.name: Popcorn Shrimp n’ Fries
items.description: (12 pieces) Fried shrimp, cajun fries, served with cocktail sauce.

items.name: Cajun Edamame
items.description: steamed whole soybeans tossed in our house garlic lemon pepper sauce (served mild, medium or spicy).

items.name: Cajun Fries
items.description: crispy fries tossed in Cajun seasoning.

items.name: Sweet Potato Fries
items.description: fried and served with buttercream.

items.name: Fried Calamari
items.description: thinly sliced battered calamari, fried and coated with Cajun seasoning; served with cocktail sauce.

items.name: Fried Fish Tacos
items.description: (3 per order) crispy battered white fish served on corn tortillas and topped with pico de gallo.

items.name: Grilled Shrimp Tacos
items.description: (3 per order) Cajun marinated grilled shrimp served on corn tortillas and topped with pico de gallo.

items.name: Shrimp Bites
items.description: (6 bites) Cajun marinated grilled shrimp served on tortilla scoop chips topped with pico de gallo, sour cream, and sriracha.

items.name: Coconut Sea Snails
items.description: Wild caught baby snails, coriander, lemongrass, coconut cream.

items.name: Garlic Noodles
items.description: Sautéed in garlic butter.

items.name: Kickin' Chowder
items.description: baby clams, potato, white-cream based chowder, served with oyster crackers.

items.name: KC Gumbo
items.description: chicken-pork sausages, shrimp, corn, celery, okra, tomato, bell peppers (served with or without rice; mild or spicy).

items.name: Seafood Scampi
items.description: scallops, shrimp, clams, and mussels in a creamy garlic white wine sauce; served with pita bread.

items.name: Seafood Alfredo Pasta
items.description: Thin fettuccine with scallops, shrimp, clams and mussels in creamy alfredo sauce.

items.name: KC Tilapia
items.description: topped with Cajun garlic butter; served with red rice and steamed broccoli.

items.name: KC Trout
items.description: topped with Cajun garlic butter; served with red rice and steamed broccoli.
